titleStmt.title: Some discourses, sermons, and remains of the Reverend Mr. Jos. Glanvil ... collected into one volume, and published by Ant. Horneck ... ; together with a sermon preached at his funeral, by Joseph Pleydell ...
titleStmt.author: Glanvill, Joseph, 1636-1680.
Horneck, Anthony, 1641-1697.
Pleydell, Josiah, d. 1707.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Henry Mortlock ... and James Collins ...,

notesStmt.note: "A sermon preached at the funeral of Mr. Jos. Glanvil" has special t.p. and separate paging.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
